RedisCaches.scala

package cache

import akka.actor.ActorSystem
import io.growing.micros.middleware.cache.{ CacheConfig, CacheSystem, RedisConfigs }
import play.api.Play

/**
 *
 * CacheSystem的默认实现，根据配置命名空间，以及cacheConfig获取缓存实例
 *
 * @author wusi
 */
object RedisCaches extends CacheSystem {

  override def actorSystem: ActorSystem = Play.current.injector.instanceOf[ActorSystem]
  def redisConfigs: RedisConfigs = Play.current.injector.instanceOf[RedisConfigs]

  /**
   *
   * 根据配置和命名空间获取缓存实例，默认是 default 命名空间
   *
   * @param cacheConfig 前缀以及存活时间
   * @param nameSpace   redis实例命名空间 eg: default将获取 redis.dbs.default.db下的配置
   */
  def newRedisCache[V](cacheConfig: CacheConfig, nameSpace: String = "default")(implicit manifest: Manifest[V]): io.growing.micros.middleware.cache.Cache[V] = {
    val redisConfig = redisConfigs.getRedisConfig(nameSpace)
    super.newRedisCache(
      cacheConfig,
      redisConfig)
  }
}
